lines.gurmukhi: kvn AMjn kir locn iblokIAq kvn kuMfl kir s√çn sunIjIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Kavan Anjan Kari Lochan Bilokeeata , Kavan Koundal Kari Sravan Souneejeeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: By the use of which collyrium in the eyes can one see the beloved Lord? What ear-rings can help hear his sound?

lines.gurmukhi: kvn qMmol kir rsnw sujsu rsY kOn kir kMkn nmskwr kIjIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Kavan Tanmol Kari Rasanaa Sujasu Rasai , Kaoun Kari Kankan Namasakaar Keejeeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Which betel leaf when chewed can help the tongue repeat the supreme praise of the beloved Lord? What bangles should be worn in the hands to greet and salute Him?

lines.gurmukhi: kvn kusm hwr kir aur DwrIAq kOn AMgIAw su kir AMkmwl dIjIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Kavan Kousam Haar Kari Ur Dhaareeata , Kaoun Angeeaa Su Kari Ankamaal Deejeeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: What flower garland can make Him reside in the heart? What bodice should be worn to embrace Him with hands?

lines.gurmukhi: kaun hIr cIr lptwie kY lpyt lIjY kvn sMjog piRXw pRym rsu pIjIAY ]626]
lines.transliteration_english: Kaoun Heer Cheer Lapataai Kai Lapayt Leejai , Kavan Sanjog Priyaa Praym Rasu Peejeeai ?626?

Shabad OS B.translation: What dress and diamond can be worn to entice Him? With what method can the union of the beloved be relished? The crux of the whole thing is that all embellishments are worthless. Relishing His love can only unite one with Him.  (626)
